69b4(rgyud 'grel): la rten pa nyid yin gyi gang zag la rton pa nyid ma yin pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di'i phyir tshig 'bru'i rjes su 'brang ba nyid ma yin no/ /'dir sems can rnams kyi mos pa sna tshogs pa'i dbang las thams cad mkhyen pa du ma dang/
69b5(rgyud 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa'i skad du ma dang/ /bzhugs pa'i gnas du ma dang/ gsol ba 'debs pa po du ma dang/ chos ston pa du ma'o zhes pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud thams cad ston pa ni e waM mA ya/ sh+ru ta ces pa la sogs
69b6(rgyud 'grel): pas mgrin pa dang/ rkan la sogs pa'i rtsol gyis skyes pa lha'i skad cig pus ma yin no/ /'dir dang por re zhig nyan thos kyi tshul sde snod gsum la sogs pa la chos bstan pa ni ma ga d+ha'i skad kyis so/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yul du
69b7(rgyud 'grel): ma'i yul gyi skad kyis theg pa gsum ston par mdzad pa ste/ e waM mA ya sh+ru ta ces pa la sogs par legs par sbyar ba'i skad cig pus ni ma yin no/ /'dir gal te e waM mA ya sh+ru ta ces bya ba la sogs pa legs par sbyar ba'i
70a1(rgyud 'grel): tshig mgrin pa dang rkan la sogs pa'i 'bad rtsol las skyes pa nyi tshe bas de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa yin na/ de'i tshe chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dus du mar yang de bzhin gshegs pas ston
70a2(rgyud 'grel): par mi nus shing/ sdud pa pos bri bar bzhi yang mi nus te nyi tshe ba'i tshig yin pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /'dir sprul pa'i sku mdza' yas pa med pa'i phyir na mdza' yas pa mdza' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sems can mdza' yas
70a3(rgyud 'grel): pa mdza' yas pa'i sgra rnams kyi cig char chos ston par mi 'gyur zhing/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ston pa med pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur na/ de ltar yang ma yin no/ /'dir sangs rgyas tshad med pa dang chos
70a4(rgyud 'grel): tshad med pa dang/ dge 'dun tshad med pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi phyir ston pa po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa gcig ma yin zhing/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i skad gang sems can thams cad kyi skad cig rnams kyis don rtogs
70a5(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa gcig ma yin no/ /bzhugs pa'i gnas nges par bstan pa gcig ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang gsol ba 'debs pa po gcig ma yin no/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su bcom ldan
70a6(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyis gsungs pa de nyid la 'jug par bya ste/ dud 'gro yi dags lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha mi 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la/ byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden pa'i chos gsung zhing/ rang
70a7(rgyud 'grel): rang skad gzhan rnams kyis srid gsum ma tshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa/ /'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyis min/ /slar yang de nyid dra gsungs pa/ skye ba snga mar rang
70b1(rgyud 'grel): gi snying gis bskyed pa'i zhi dang chags sogs dngos po rnams kyis ni/ /bag chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig ni du mar smon lam yon tan dbang gis mthong/ /don gcig du ma'i skad ni rang rang dngos pos srog chags rnams kyi snying
70b2(rgyud 'grel): la rab tu 'jug /gnas can rnams kyi bsod nams slad du 'khor lo la gnas bsod snyoms rnam pa rgyu ru gshegs/ de skad du yang gsungs pa/ ji ltar chu 'dzin las ni bsil zhim dang zhing 'jam la yang ba'i chu byung ba/ /de ni sa gzhir
70b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud dang gnas kyi dbye bas rnam pa mang po'i ro nyid 'gyur/ /de bzhin legs yang thugs rje'i sprin gyi snying po las byung yan lag brgyad ldan lam/ rgyud dang gnas kyi dbye bas skye dgu rnams la rnam pa mang po'i ro nyid 'gyur/ /de'i phyir
70b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can gyi don gyi ngor sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngal du rab tu 'jug pa rnams dang/ dmyal bar gshegs pa yang byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyi brtag par nus pa ma yin te/ dpal a ra l+la'i rgyud chen por gsungs
70b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams rkang gnyis kyi mchog nyid thob ste/ sangs rgyas kyis zlos gar ston par mdzad do ces so/ /dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub//
70b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog ces so/ /de'i phyir/ la lar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzad/ /la lar dga' ba spyod pa dang/ /lha las babs pa sprul pa dang/ /de bzhin khab nas nges 'byung dang/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ /la lar
70b7(rgyud 'grel): rab tu 'byung bar mdzad/ /'dul ba ston mdzad de bzhin du/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mngon pa'i chos/ /la lar sngags kyi tshul 'chad mdzad/ /la lar pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ /la lar bye brag smra ba'i lam/ /la lar mdo sde ston pa ste/ la
71a1(rgyud 'grel): lar rnam shes smra ba yang/ /la lar de bzhin dbu ma'o/ /la lar dmyal bar gshegs pa dang/ /la lar sems can rjes srung ba/ /sems can gdul ba rgyur byas nas/ /snying rje'i bsam pas gar mdzad do/ /ces pa'o/ /dpal
71a2(rgyud 'grel): mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa/ /phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong/ /'dren pa rang rgyal bse ru'i tshul/ /des 'byung sna tshogs des 'byung ba/ /'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po/ /dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad/ /'dod chags
71a3(rgyud 'grel): bral bas dbang po thul/ zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud chen por gsungs pa/ ji ltar rgyal ba'i dbang po phyogs bcur gnas/ /de yi sku la rkang rus sha
71a4(rgyud 'grel): med kyang/ /sems can phan ched ring srel rab 'jog cing/ /sprul pa'i sku yis bya ba mdzad pa'o/ /ces so/ /gsungs pa yang/ sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog /sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba/ /phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs
71a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byed/ /ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa zhes so/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang/ mi mnyam 'di rnams dgrol ba'i slad du sras bcas rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te/ /mngal ni rab
71a6(rgyud 'grel): tu gzung ba mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rjes byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni/ /nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa stengs gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te/ sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan
71a7(rgyud 'grel): 'das ni bdag po'i sku can de kho na'o zhes so/ /dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa'i yon tan gyi le'ur yang bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi sku can te/ dge slong rnams 'di ni 'jigs tshogs
71b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi ? ma sems cig/ dge slong rnams nga la ni chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par ltos shig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di ni yang dag pa'i mthas rab tu phye bar blta bar bya'o zhes bya'o/ /de'i phyir/ rgyal ba'i dag pa'i sku ni skyes shing ma nyams
71b2(rgyud 'grel): srid pa gsum pa gsum po la yang gnas/ /bcom ldan 'das de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis bcings ma yin/ /de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid gsum gnas su las kyi sar gnas nyi ma kye/ /
71b3(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'phrog lha gzhan nam snga ma yin no/ /zhes so/ /gsungs pa yang/ mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste/ /skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os/ /'jig rten dgra ste rab kyi mchog/
71b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig pa ma lus sel ba po zhes so /de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang pha rol tu phyin pa bcus nges par byung ba sa bcu'i dbang phyug dbang bcu thob pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sprul pa'i sku du ma
71b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis byang chub sems dpas gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston par mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' de du ma ni ma yin no/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis bsod nams
71b6(rgyud 'grel): dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /gsungs pa yang/ bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs/ /ye shes ye shes 'byung gnas che/ ye shes ldan pa yod med shes/ tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsags pa po/ /zhes so/ /mi 'jigs pa la
71b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa can stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su mdza' yas pa mdza' yas pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i sgyu ma sgrib pa med pa rnams
72a1(rgyud 'grel): kyis mdza' yas pa mdza' yas pa'i sems can rnams la/ mdza' yas pa mdza' yas pa'i skad rnams kyi gsol ba 'debs pa po sna tshogs kyis gsol ba btab pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i skad sems can
72a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyi sgra la rab tu zhugs pas 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rab tu ston par mdzad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lha'i le'ur gsungs pa yang/ rab 'byor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' 
72a3(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pas/ 'jig rten rang bzhin gyis skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i ched du chos ston to/ /de bzhin du tshor ba
72a4(rgyud 'grel): dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i ched du ston to/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i ched du chos ston
72a5(rgyud 'grel): to ces so/ /gsungs pa yang/ yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang/ khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog /dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste/ /bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog /byed pa sems can kun don byed/ /'phan 'dod
72a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can mnyes gshin pa/ zhes so/ /dpal he ru ka mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa/ e ma byang chub sems khyod ni/ gdul byar bsam pa mnyes gshin pa/ /thugs rje'i lcags kyus drangs nas ni/ /rnam pa
72a7(rgyud 'grel): du mas tha dad do/ /zhes so/ /de bzhin du bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam du yang gsungs pa/ lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad/ /grul bum rnams dang mi yi skad rnams te/ 'gro ba kun gyi skad rnams ji tsam par/ /
72b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to/ /zhes so/ /de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa gcig ma yin la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa ni gcig kho na ste/ dpal thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo sder gsungs pa/ theg pa gcig
72b2(rgyud 'grel): dang tshul yang gcig pu ste/ 'dren pa rnams kyi bstan pa 'di gcig pu/ /bdag gis thabs la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /theg pa gsum po rnams ni nye bar bstan zhes so/ /dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang
72b3(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis/ /'gro ba'i don la rtog pa po/ /theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung la/ /theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas/ /zhes so/ /ces pa la sogs pa don la rton pa sgrub pa'o
72b4(rgyud 'grel): da ni rgyud sna tshogs su gsungs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i man ngag gi rim pas dbang bskur bzhi pa rtog par byas nas rgyud ston par byed par bya'o/ /las dang ye shes phyag rgya che/ /dam tshig zhes bya 'od gsal rnams/ /rgyu dang bsgom bya de
72b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du/ /thob bya bzhi pa 'jig pa med/ /mdor bstan pa'i tshig 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa bya ste/ rgyu zhes pa ni dang por re zhig las kyi phyag rgya las byung ba gang lhan cig skyes pa 'pho ba med pa'i bde bar bcom ldan 'das
72b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsungs so/ /de ni bden pa kho na ste 'on kyang kun rdzob tu 'jig rten pa'i dpe yis me long lta bu yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de'i phyir dbang po rnon pos las kyi phyag rgya gzung bar bya ba ma yin no/ /bsgom par bya
72b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa lha'i rnam pas sbyangs nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i cho ga ji lta bar gsal bar byas te/ bsgrub cing bsrub pa'i sbyor bas ye shes
73a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi me par la/ ji srid haM yig bsregs pa 'dzag pa ni/ ri bong can dpal ba nas mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba dang rdo rje dang pad+ma'i lte bar 'ongs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bos yul dang dbang po mdza' dag bde ba chen por ro mnyam
73a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i go 'phang la gang gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ de'i rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur nas ji srid du dpal phyag rgya chen po mngon du phyogs par gyur pa'i bar du gnas par bya'o/ /thob bya
73a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po ste/ rmi lam dang mig 'phrul dang yid kyi rang bzhin dang 'dra ba ste/ de la khyud nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji srid par mngon du bya'o/ /'jig pa med pa ni mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i ngo bo can no/ /de ltar
73a4(rgyud 'grel): lus dang ngag dang sems dang ye shes rnam par dag pas phyag rgya bzhi'i ngo bo ji lta ba'o/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas la 'jug par bya ste/ pad+mar rdo rje zhugs dang rtse mo can la rlung dang thig le mi lhung gsum pa'o/ /'di
73a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab gsal nges par lus dang ngag dang sems kyi phyag rgya'o/ /chags dang chags med dang po'i mthar son dang po mchog bde'i gter ni rnal 'byor bgrod bya bzhi pa ste/ phyag rgya
73a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi legs pa'i ma rgyud de 'gyur rnam bcu dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o zhes so/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ 'gyur dang 'gyur med de nas ga-yo/ /mi g.yo dri ma med pa gzhan zhes pa de bzhin gshegs
73a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nges pa'o/ /dpal rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa de nyid la 'jug par bya ste/ las kyi phyag rgya yongs bsgrubs nas/ /chos kyi phyag rgya rnams sgom bya/ /de las steng du phyag
73b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya che/ /de las dam tshig yang dag 'byung zhes so/ /de skad du dpal mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa/ las kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang/ /ye shes phyag rgya'i dmigs pa dang/ /phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor
73b2(rgyud 'grel): bas/ /mi 'gyur ba de 'phel bar 'gyur zhes so/ /de bzhin du dpal don dam pa'i bsnyen par yang gsungs pa/ thar pa'i dpal mo ma nyams bde ba de/ /dor nas dge med gzhon nu mar rtse ba/ /phal cher sngon bsags
73b3(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i las gang gis/ /bdud rtsi dor nas dug ni 'thung bar byed ces so/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa/ snying ni rnyog bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dang brtag pa'i phyag rgya btang byas te/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i
73b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub slad du rgyal pa mchog bskyed mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med/ /rnam par 'gyur ba med pa mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor bgrod bya ther zug gnas/ /ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma
73b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor los rje rig bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin du yang gsungs pa/ gang zhig shes rab nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin dang/ /shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu
73b6(rgyud 'grel): ba dag la bzhi pa'i skad cig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang/ /de rnams thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang gang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya
73b7(rgyud 'grel): mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o zhes so/ /slar yang de nyid du gsungs pa/ sems kyi snang ba tsam ste rang gi yid la skyes pa me long gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid/ /mdza' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas sras kyis bsten gang rnal
74a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste/ /ye shes me lce rab rgyas de ni bdud tshogs yul dang bcas pa mdza' dag sreg byed cing/ /lus la chags sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed ces
74a2(rgyud 'grel): so/ /ci ltar zhe na/ gsungs pa/ 'gyur med bde ba'i 'bras ster phyag rgya bzhi po 'di rnams grong 'brog dgon pa dur khrod dang/ /mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yi khang pa kun tu dus kun du/ /rab dga' i
74a3(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba la gnas 'jig rten lam las rab grol rigs min mngon spyod cing/ /lus stobs bde ster bza' dang btung sogs longs spyod dang ldan rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya zhes so/ /de bzhin du 'di nyid du yang gsungs pa/
74a4(rgyud 'grel): bza' dang btung dang de bzhin khrus/ /sad dang nyal yang bsam par bya/ /phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas/ /de nas rtag pa nyid du 'gro ces dang/ chu bo'i rgyun ni rab 'bab dang/ /mar me'i 'od kyi rgyun bzhin du/ /rtag tu
74a5(rgyud 'grel): goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /nyin dang mtshan mor gnas par bya ces so/ /gsungs pa yang/ ji ltar shing gi snying por med/ /gnas pa ma gtsubs 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de ltar goms med byang chub ni/ /skye ba 'di la skye ba min
74a6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa yang/ chos kyi sbyin bdag gtso bo ste/ /phyag rgya bzhi po'i don ston pa/ /'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog /nges 'byung gsum pa bgrod
74a7(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi ces so/ /da ni dang por re zhig rdo rje sems dpa' i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ngo bo nges pa'i don gyi rim pas gsal bar bya ste/ dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du gsungs pa yang/ e yig nam mkha' i khams dbus su//
74b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba'i bzhir/ /waM gi rdo rje sems dpa' 'di/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las/ /gi le zla ba khu ba sku/ /rnam par bcad pa rdul nyi gsungs/ /a yig mun can thugs rab brjod/ /mkha' khams e
74b2(rgyud 'grel): la rnam par gnas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /sku gsung thugs kyi chags pa yis/ /srid gsum bdag nyid la gnas pa'o zhes so/ /de bzhin du gsungs pa/ mkha' dbyings
74b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dbus gnas par/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor sgom pa ste/ /lus ngag sems kyi nga rgyal ni/ /bsams nas bskal par de gnas so/ /zhes so/ /dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa/ /rigs gsum
74b4(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba gsang sngags mkhan/ /dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'chang/ /gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa/ /theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po ces so/ /de ltar brda rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyis gnas par byas nas de rnams
74b5(rgyud 'grel): su cher gsal te/ yid la mi byed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rtag tu dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/ /zhes pa'i rgyu 'di yis lha rnams yongs su smin pa'i ched dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i ched du dpal
74b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa la sogs pa dang kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal por yang/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes pa la sogs pas bzhugs pa'i gnas nges par bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ /dngos po gang zhig dpal
74b7(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa la sogs par ming 'di yis gsungs pa'i dngos po de nyid mngon par brjod pa 'bum pa la sogs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal por/ gsang ba zhes la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/ /de yang bla ma dam pa'i
75a1(rgyud 'grel): man ngag las rgyud ni rgyud gzhan gyis dang dgongs pa'i skad gzhan gyis rtogs par bya'o/ /gsungs pa yang/ dang po'i gsang chen ni e waM du gyur pa sngon bsgoms pa'i rig pa'o/ /mdza' ste mdza' ma'i
75a2(rgyud 'grel): dgyes pa ni sh+ru taM bsten par bshad pa'o/ /dbus su mA ya ni mchog ste shin tu khyad du 'phags pa'o/ /dus gcig na ni bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bdag nyid la rtag tu bzhugs pa'o zhes pa'o/ /dgos pa ci zhig
75a3(rgyud 'grel): gis na sdud par mdzad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rab rnams la/ e waM mA ya zhes pas nges par bstan/ i daM ma yA dang/ e tad mA ya zhes pa 'di lta bu la sogs par yang smra bar nus pa
75a4(rgyud 'grel): kho na'o zhe na/ 'di la brjod par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brda shes rab dang thabs gsal bar byed pa e waM zhes pa 'di gsung rab kyi dang por nges par brjod par bya'o/ /smras pa/ gal te de lta na
75a5(rgyud 'grel): sdud par byed pas 'dir bdag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na/ 'di ni bden mdo 'dir sdud par byed pa po ni yod pa ma yin no/ /smras pa/ ci'i don
75a6(rgyud 'grel): du btsun pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa sdud par byed pa rnams 'jig rten yang dag par bstan zhes smras pa/ 'dir kun dga' bo ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ste/ phyag na rdo rje yin la
75a7(rgyud 'grel): yang gzhan ma yin gyi/ /rdo rje 'chang chen po kho na'o/ /gzhan du na mdo sde lags pa'i chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang/ rdo rje theg pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung nas chad pa dang lhag pa med par lan cig
75b1(rgyud 'grel): thos nas 'dzin par ga la nus/ /'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi mthun mong ma yin pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du gsungs pa/ de nas gzhan yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa bshad par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/
75b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni 'jam dpal du 'gyur ro/ /lha mo chen mo sgyu ma ni 'jig rten dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro/ /lha mo dpal ni grags 'dzin mar ro/ /sgra gcan 'dzin ni rdo rje sems dpa' o/ /shA ri'i bu ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
75b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o/ /gnas brtan 'phags pa kun dga' bo ni kun tu bzang po'o/ /gnas brten lha byin ni lha'i dbang po'o/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal shAkya thub pa ni rnam par snang mdzad chen por 'gyur ro zhes so ces pa'o/ /
75b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du dpal a ral+li chen po'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa/ rgyal po chen po zas gtsang ni/ a ral+li ru yang dag gsal/ /sgyu ma chen mo rig gi der/ /'gro ba shes rab thabs bdag nyid/ /rdo rje sems dpa' don kun grub/ /mchog tu
75b5(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba bde ba che/ /lha mo sa 'tsho phyag rgya che/ /sgra gcan 'dzin bzang bde ba che/ /sa 'tsho ma ni sgyu 'phrul che/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin spros pa las/ /lhan cig skyes dga' dga' rab bshad/ /rdo rje sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul gyis/ /slar
75b6(rgyud 'grel): yang bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /skyed pa por ni rab tu grags/ /sgyu ma chen mo skyed mor 'gyur/ /de nyid phyag rgyar rab tu grags shes so/ /rigs pa 'di yis sdud par byed pa po ni 'khor ro zhes pa'o/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs
75b7(rgyud 'grel): pa/ yang/ /lha mi'i bla ma mtho ris 'jig rten du de dbang po sa steng du ni 'khor lo sgyur/ /sa 'og klu yi rgyal po gdengs can rigs kyis btud dang kun 'gro mchog nga ye shes dang/ /sangs rgyas thub dbang 'gyur med
76a1(rgyud 'grel): mchog dang khyab bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor dang/ /rig byed oM gyi yi ge gtsang ma'o/ /rgyal po dngos po kun gyis bdag la skyabs su song zhes so/ /las dang po pa'i sems can rnams gzhug
76a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ched du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zlos gar rab tu bstan pa'o/ /'di la gsungs la/ sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing/ /chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/ /sems can rnams ni gdul don du/ /mya ngan 'das pa nye bar bstan zhes so//
76a3(rgyud 'grel): smras pa/ e baM zhes pa'i yi ge gnyis po shes rab dang thabs kyis bdag nyid yin pa lags mod/ /'di yang ji ltar shes par bya zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang pos yongs su zhus par gsungs pa/ brgya byin
76a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis gsol pa/ e baM zhes 'di ci don du/ /ci'i phyir dang po rab tu sbyar/ /'di ci bde gshegs gsungs yin nam/ /nyan thos kyis bshad yin nam ci/ /bdag gi the tshom 'di rnams kun/ /srid mthar mdzad pas gsal
76a5(rgyud 'grel): du gsol/ /dam chos yon tan smras pa yi/ /lha yi dbang po'i tshig gsan nas/ /de las legs so zhes byin te/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /gang don thams cad gzigs pa yis/ /dang por e waM zhes gsungs
76a6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ de ni go rims ji bzhin khyod/ /lha yi bdag po mnyan par gyis/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dang/ /bzhi stong gi ni grangs rnams kyis/ /kun gyi gzhi dang pha ma ni/ /yi ge gnyis su bdag gis bshad/ /a yi yi ge ma
76a7(rgyud 'grel): ru 'gyur/ /waM yig kyang ni pha ru bshad/ /thig le der ni sbyor bar 'gyur/ /sbyor te mchog tu rmad byung ba'o/ /e yig pad+ma zhes bshad de/ /waM yig rdo rje kho na yang/ /thig le der ni sa bon 'gyur/ /de las 'gro ba gsum po
76b1(rgyud 'grel): skyes/ /e yi yi ge shes rab 'gyur/ /waM yig rab dga' i bdag po'o/ /thig le gzhom med de nyid de/ /de las skyes pa yi ge rnams/ /chos kyi phyag rgya yi ge gnyis/ /de nyid shes pa gang gis shes/ /de ni sems can thams cad la//
76b2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo skor byed 'gyur/ /skye bo gang gi yi ge gnyis/ /mi shes rtag tu 'don byed pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas chos rnams las/ /phyi rol longs spyod spangs sgra bzhin/ /e waM yid gnyis sgyu ma ste/ /'dir ni thams cad mkhyen
76b3(rgyud 'grel): pa bzhugs/ /de phyir dam chos bstan bcos kyi/ /thog mar de ni rab tu bshad/ /de phyir brgya byin lha bdag po/ /gal te rtag pa'i gnas 'dod na/ /yig gnyis sgyu ma dran bya zhing/ /dam pa'i chos la bla mar byes/ /zhes gsungs
76b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yang/ dam chos chos rgyal gsal bar ldan/ /'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog ces so/ /'di skad bdag gis zhes pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje tshig rnams kyi don yang bshad pa'i rgyud la 'jug par bya ste e waM rdo rje chu skyes dang
76b5(rgyud 'grel): nor bu'i nang gnas thig le 'dzin/ /de nyid tha dad med bdag nyid/ /ma mA zhes pas rab gsal byas/ /'di skad bdag gis thos zhes brjod/ /'khor lo sgyur ba'i gzugs can gyis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /de ni ston
76b6(rgyud 'grel): byed bde ba nga/ /thos pa zhes pa bdag gi ni/ /bdag nyid kho nas bdag nyid kyis zhes so/ /gsungs pa'ang/ /nga las 'gro ba thams cad byung/ /nga las sa gsum po yang byung/ /nga yis 'di kun khyab pa ste/ /'gro ba rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong
76b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes so/ /slar yang 'di nyid du gsungs pa/ /'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga/ /rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga/ /'gro ba'i ston pa bsgrub bya nga/ /'jig rten pa nga 'jig rten nga/ /lhan cig skyes dga' i rang bzhin nga/ /mchog mdza' dga' 
77a1(rgyud 'grel): bral dang po can/ /dngos dang dngos po med pa dang/ /dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas pa/ /gang zhig le los bsnun pa dang/ /rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes/ /rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga ni/ /bde ba can du nga gnas
77a2(rgyud 'grel): so zhes so/ /dpal thams cad mkhyen pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rgyud du yang gsungs pa/ /spro dang sdud pa'i gnas la ni/ /gsang chen dam pa rmad byung bar/ /shes rab bdud rtsi'i mtsho gnas su/ /bcom ldan 'das ni skye med
77a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs/ /stong pa ma yin mi stong min/ /rnam par mi rtog gzhi med pa/ /spros pa med cing snang ba med/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che ces so/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa/ phung po lnga yi rang bzhin
77a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la thugs rjes bzhugs/ /nges pa rnam par ma bsgrubs bsod nams min pa bsags pa'i sems can rnams smin don du ste/ /gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang
77a5(rgyud 'grel): zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams slad du'o/ /gang zhig e waM yi ge la gnas mchog gi ngas pa can rnams mchog la dgod don du'o zhes so/ /dus gcig na zhes pa la sogs pa 'di'i don ni skad cig cig
77a6(rgyud 'grel): gis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa na'o/ /gsungs pa yang/ mkhas pa chen pos skad cig la/ /chos kun khong du chud par 'chang zhes so/ /rgyud gzhan du yang gsungs pa/ sa bon gzugs kyis yang dag 'dres
77a7(rgyud 'grel): lha yi 'khor lo dam pa ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i dus 'di ni/ /dus gcig na zhes brjod par bya zhes so/ /bcom ldan 'das zhes pa 'di'i don 'di yin te/ /dbang phyug brgyad kyis bcom ldan 'das/ /bde ba chen po'i go 'phangs
77b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas/ /dpal rdo rje rtse mor yang gsungs pa/ /nyon mongs las dang de bzhin skye/ /nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib de bzhin/ /mi mthun phyogs kyis chos gang bcom/ /de ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bshad/ /ces so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces
77b2(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di'i don 'di yin te/ rgyal ba phung po lnga rnams 'dir/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bshad ces bya'o/ /dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyal ba'i le'ur yang gsungs pa/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams la gzhan par
77b3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtogs par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phung po dang khams dang skye mched nyid ni stong pa dben pa zhi ba yin pa'i phyir na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang phung po dang khams dang skye mched ni gnyis su
77b4(rgyud 'grel): med gnyis su bya med de stong pa nyid dang/ dben pa nyid kyi phyir dmigs su med do/ /gang chos thams cad kyi dmigs su med pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod par bya'o/ /zhes so sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje zhes pa 'di'i nges pa'i don ni rgyud gzhan du
77b5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs te/ de/ bdag nyid kyi ni sku gsung thugs/ /snying 'di'i rdo rje bde ba che/ /rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa/ ces 'di rdo rjer brjod ce na/ sra zhing snying po khong stong med/ /bcang med dbyer med mtshan nyid med/ /mi 'tshig 'jig pa ma yin
77b6(rgyud 'grel): pa/ /stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya/ /'gro drug 'khor lo nyes byas kyang/ /rdo rje yis ni 'joms par byed/ /byang chub sems gang de rdo rje/ /nyon mongs thams cad 'joms par byed ces so/ /btsun mo zhes pa 'di'i don ni 'di yin te/
77b7(rgyud 'grel): btsun mo legs so sbyangs phyag rgya ste/ b+ha ga legs sbyar pad+ma'o/ zhes bya'o/ /dgongs pa lung ston pa'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gang bsten pa/ /bcu gsum pa yi sar gyur gang/ /der ni btsun mor yang dag bshad//
78a1(rgyud 'grel): dam chos b+ha ga zhes par yang/ /de la ci'i phyir b+ha ga zhes bya zhe na/ 'di'i don ni 'di yin te/ gnas gang zhig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi
78a2(rgyud 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur pa bzhugs pa de kho na na/ dam tshig sems dpa' nyid yin pa'i phyir/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis b+ha ga zhes gsungs te/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
78a3(rgyud 'grel): gcod byed cing/ /nyon mongs rnams bcom gzhan mi thub/ /de'i phyir de ni b+ha gar brjod/ /mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas pa'i phyed du yin pas na bzhugs so zhes pa'i don to/ /tshig 'di bstan par byed pa'i don du gsungs pa/
78a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyud du bka' stsal te/ de nas nyams dga' ba yi gnas/ /nam mkha' kun la rab gnas pa/ /rdo rje rin chen 'od kyis gsal/ /dri med gzi brjid kyis brgyan pa/ /dra ba me long me tog ldan/ /me tog phreng brgyan
78a5(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che/ /rdo rje kun gyi 'dus byas pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' i gnas chen po/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes bsten pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' i gnas kyi mchog /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi gzhi/ /bde ba chen po rdo rje che'i/ /nor bu
78a6(rgyud 'grel): rin chen mchog ces bya/ /rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thig le yi/ /gzugs kyis bzhugs shing gnas pa'o zhes so/ /de kho na ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig pa'i sku can
78a7(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po'i ngo bo sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin pa gzhom du med pa'o zhes pa'o/ /dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs pa/ /sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po/ /mchod bya rjed bya drang srong che/ /rigs gsum 'chang ba
78b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags mkhan/ /dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin/ /yang de nyid du bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rje/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba/ /sangs
78b2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi gsung yin no zhes pa la sogs pa rgya cher ro/ /de bzhin du dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang bka' stsal pa/ rgyud rnams su gang 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes gsungs te/ 'di ltar bdag gis zhes pa ste/ rdo rje can ni zla ba zhu las gang
78b3(rgyud 'grel): zhig spyi mgrin snying kha'i chu skyes lte gsang ba/ /rdo rje bud med rnams kyi b+ha gar thig le grol ba gsum gyis mchog gi pad+mar gnas/ /de 'dir sangs rgyas zhing du rab zhugs bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya ces so/ /'di nyid du yang
78b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa/ ston pa sum cu gnyis mtshan can/ /gtso bo dpe byed brgyad cur ldan/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde can du/ /khu ba'i ming gis rnam par gnas shes so/ /mdza' yas rtogs las des grol ba/ /zla ba shar kha ltar dang ba/ /de las rang nyid che nyid kyis/ /sems can kun la
78b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes brtse bas/ /sprul pa pa yi skur mdzad de/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mchog can/ /gang gi srid pa'i rtse mo nas/ /mnar med bar gyi khams gsum khyab ces pa'o/ mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan
78b6(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba/ sdug gu? 'jig rten gsum na mdzes/ /'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te/ 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med/ /mgon skyobs 'jig rten yid gtsugs pa/ /skyabs dang skyobs pa bla na med ces so/ /dpal thams cad mkhyen pa 'jigs byed kyi rgyud du yang gsungs pa
78b7(rgyud 'grel): de nas shin tu chen po des/ /sems can kun la rjes brtse bas/ /sprul pa pa'i skur mdzad/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ /de med bde ba nyid mi 'gyur/ /bde ba spangs nas de ma yin/ /khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan 'gyur/ /de yi bde ba 'dod mar bshad/ /de ni rang sangs
79a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas rnams dang/ /nyan thos rnams kyi spyod yul min/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod yul lo/ /rdo rje pad+ma las byung ba'o/ /zhes pa la sogs pa nges pa'i don to/ /dpal nam mkha' mnyam pa'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa/ /'gro
79a2(rgyud 'grel): ba 'di kun sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid/ /sna tshogs zlos gar yid 'ong blta bar gyis/ /mchog tu bde ba chen po gcig bu de/ /gcig dang du ma'i nyams kyis gar mdzad do/ /ces pa la sogs pa'o/ /de'i phyir na gcig dang gcig min
79a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam bral 'di/ /skad cig las gcig mchog dga' o/ /rang gis rig bya'i ye shes 'di/ /ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul lo/ /'di ni byin rlabs rim pa ste/ /kun mkhyen ye shes de rang bzhin/ /sa dang chu dang me dang ni/ /rlung dang nam mkha' nyid thams cad/ /rang bzhin
79a4(rgyud 'grel): rig pa'i tsher ba ni/ /skad cig las ni gnod mi 'gyur/ /mtho ris sa steng sa 'og rnams/ /skad cig las ni sku gcig 'gyur/ /rang gzhan cha yi rnam rtog gis/ /gnod par nus pa nyid ma yin zhes so/ /mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa/ /thub pa med
79a5(rgyud 'grel): pa dpe med pa/ /mi mngon ma snang gsal byed min/ /cha med kun 'gro khyab pa'o/ /phra zhing zag med sa bon no/ /rdul med rdul bral dri ma med/ /nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa/ /shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag /kun mkhyen kun rig dam pa po/ /rnam par shes pa'i
79a6(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid 'das/ /ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba zhes so/ /de ltar sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba sku bzhi'i bdag nyid can bcom ldan 'das kye'i rdo rje sa bcu gnyis kyi dbang phyug ni chos ston pa po'o/ /de ni rdo rje snying pos gsol ba btab pa'i
79a7(rgyud 'grel): de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /e ma'o rdo rje snying po snying rje chen po legs so legs so zhes pa la sogs pa ste/ /rdo rje snying po ci zhig tu brjod par bya ce na/ rdo rje'i sgra yis shes rab yin la/ de'i pad+ma snying po ste/ byang chub sems kyi ngo bos gnas
79b1(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi phyir na/ rdo rje snying po zhes brjod par bya'o/ /rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ ci yis rdo rje sems dpa' lags/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpar 'gyur/ /ci phyir sems dpa' chen po lags/ /ci ltar dam tshig sems dpa' gtso ces bya'o/ /'di'i don ni 'di yin te/
79b2(rgyud 'grel): dpal mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis par gsungs pa/ rang 'byung rdo rje sems dpa' 'di/ /don chen mchog tu mi 'gyur ba/ /'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang che//
79b3(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs sgra chen zad pa po/ /dam tshig sems dpa' gti mug che/ /gti mug blo yis gti mug sel/ /dam tshig zla ba bdud rtsi yi/ /khu ba 'pho med de za/ /dam tshig sems dpa' tshul 'di yis/ /gti mug blo can gti mug sel zhes so/ /de bzhin du
79b4(rgyud 'grel): dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od du yang gsungs pa/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sbyor/ /dbyibs sku rdzu 'phrul bgrod pa can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig sems/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ste/ dngos dang
79b5(rgyud 'grel): dngos med zad khyab bdag /thog ma tha ma med zhi ba/ byang chub sems te mchog mi 'gyur zhes so/ /de bzhin du 'bum phrag lnga par yang bka' stsal te/ de'i phyir de nyid la 'jug par bya'o/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mi
79b6(rgyud 'grel): phyed ces bshad pa/ /waM gi yi ger rab tu grags/ /mi phyed pa ni sku gsung thugs/ /yi ge waM gis mngon brjod bya/ /sems dpa' srid gsum gcig nyid ni/ /e yi yi ges brjod par bya/ /e yig shes rab dang ldan cig /waM yig rigs
79b7(rgyud 'grel): gsum bdag nyid can/ /lte ba'i dbus gnas dpa' bo ni/ /ze 'bru gsang ba'i spyod yul na/ /rang 'dra'i/ phyi nas shes rab dang ldan te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab brjod bya/ /phyag gnyis he ru ka ru bshad/ /'jig rten gsum bskyod nyid de'o/ /de nyid ngo bo nyid du
80a1(rgyud 'grel): brjod/ /sangs rgyas sku ste bde ba che/ /de nyid ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur/ /de ni lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/ /rgyu mthun par yang de nyid bshad/ /rdo rje rtse gcig pa ru brjed/ /gsungs pa yang/ nyin dang mtshan mer bsam gtan dbang
80a2(rgyud 'grel): las ni/ /gang tshe rin gyis sems ni dbu mar gnas/ /mdza' yas sku can shin tu rnam dag sku/ /rdo rje rtse mo gcig par rgyal ba'i dbang zhes pa'o/ /de yang bzhi pa'i gnas skabs zad/ /rnam dag mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub la gnas
80a3(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig ni/ /snying ga'i pad+ma'i dbus gnas pa/ hUM yig kho na sems dpa' brjod/ /mi bskyod pa ni kho na'o/ /thugs kyi rdo rje de nyid brjod/ /khyab 'jug nyid de phyag bzhi pa/ /de nyid dzwa la dzwa la b+hyo/ /de nyid chos kyi sku ru bshad/ /chos 'khor lor
80a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas rdo rje can/ /khyad dga' i dga' ba'i tshul 'chang ba/ /de nyid rnam par smin par bshad/ /gnyid stug zad par byed pa'o/ /ye shes chen po'i ros gang ba/ /sems dpa' chen por de brjod bya/ /mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo'i dbang/ /'od dpag med
80a5(rgyud 'grel): tu mngon brjod bya/ /de nyid gsung gi rdo rjer bshad/ /pad+ma'i phyag can de bzhin gshegs/ de nyid mchog tu dga' bar bshad/ /skyes bu byed par rab tu brjod/ /kun rdzob dang ni bzlog pa ste/ /de yang rmi lam gnas skabs zad/ /de nyid longs spyod
80a6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs skur 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ston mdzad/ /de nyid bde byed rab tu brjod/ /zhal gsum rnam pa phyag drug de/ /ki Ti ki Ti rdo rje nyid/ /he ru ka ni gsum par 'gyur/ /rtag tu dam tshig la gnas pas/ /gang zhig gnas pa yongs rtogs bya//
80a7(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig ri bong 'dzin khu ba/ bde ba chen por dpral bar gnas/ /bdud rtsi legs gnas sems dpa' o/ /yi ge oM du rab tu bshad/ /de nyid rnam par snang mdzad brjod/ byang chub sems te mchog mi 'gyur/ /tshangs pa sku yi rdo rje 'dzin/ /de nyid yongs su
80b1(rgyud 'grel): bshad par bya/ /dga' ba tshangs pa'i ngo bo ste/ /gzugs kyi sku ru de brjod bya/ /de nyid phyag na 'khor lor bshad/ /sku ni sprul pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /don dam pas de dri ma med/ /sad pa'i gnas skabs zad de nyid/ de nyid pi tsu badzrar 'gyur/ /zhal brgyad he ru ka ru bshad/ /dpa' 
80b2(rgyud 'grel): po chen po zhabs bzhi pa/ /bcu drug phyag dang yang dag ldan/ de ltar sku yi dbye ba yis/ /he ru ka ni bzhi par bshad/ /ngo bo nyid las chos su 'gyur/ /chos las longs spyod rdzogs pa nyid/ /de las sprul pa'i skur 'gyur te/ /de ltar sku ni bzhi yin no/ /tshangs
80b3(rgyud 'grel): pa sku yi rdo rje 'dzin/ /gsung gi rdo rje dbang phyug che/ /khyab 'jug thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ ces so/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud du rgyas bshad pa/ /rigs ni gsum du nges par brjod/ /ngo bo nyid dang yang dag ldan/ /rigs bzhi zhes par bshad pa yin//
80b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa bzhi yi bye brag gis/ /rigs rnams kyi ni rnam gzhag de'o/ /sangs rgyas lam ni 'dod pa yi/ /rnal 'byor ldan pas shes par bya/ /ces so/ /de ni bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje snying pos 'di skad ces gsol pa/ mtshan bsdus pa ni 'di lta bu/ /ci yis kye'i rdo
80b5(rgyud 'grel): rje lags/ /he yig gis ni ci zhig bshad/ /de bzhin badzra yis kyang ci/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ he yig gis ni snying rje che/ /badzra 'ang shes rab brjod par bya/ /mdor bstan pa'i cho ga 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa rtsa ba'i rgyud la 'jug par bya
80b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ der bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can chos dang dmigs pa med/ /snying rje 'di ni rnam gsum bshad/ 'dir sems can la dmigs pa ni/ /dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa tshes lnga rnams so/ /chos laM dmigs pa ni drug pa la sogs
80b7(rgyud 'grel): pa tshes lnga rnams so/ /dmigs pa med pa ni bcu gcig pa la sogs pa chos lnga rnams so/ /nya'i mdza' dag nag po'i tshes gcig 'jug pa'i dang po'i dang po'i dbus su snying rje bcu drug pa'o/ /'di dag gcig pa nyid stong pa nyid bcu drug pa dang snying rje bcu
81a1(rgyud 'grel): drug gi bdag nyid ces so/ /ha yig gis ni mngon par brjod/ /sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis/ /sngar bshad waM yig de nyid do/ /rdo rje'i sgra yis yi ge e/ /rnam pa thams cad stong pa nyid/ /'di dag snyoms 'jug gang
81a2(rgyud 'grel): yin pa/ /rnal 'byor sgra yis mngon brjod bya/ /shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid rgyud/ /rnal 'byor rgyud du rab brjod bya/ /'dir ming dang ming gis brjod par bya ba'i 'brel pa med pa shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor
81a3(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya ba dang/ brjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can du 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /rnal 'byor gyi sgra ni thabs kyi don nyid brjod par byed pa 'am/ shes rab kyi don nyid brjod par byed pa ma yin gyi/ /rnal 'byor gyi sgra ni shes rab dang/ thabs kyi don
81a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod par byed pa'o/ /de skad du yang gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor thabs kyi lus dang ni/ shes rab gcig pus 'gyur ba min/ /shes rab thabs ni snyoms 'jug pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rnal 'byor gsungs zhes so/ /thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid rgyud de ni
81a5(rgyud 'grel): nga yis bshad kyis zhes pa la sogs pa 'di'i nges pa'i don ni dpal rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud du gsungs pa/ /ci'i don shes rab brjod par bya/ /rab sbyar sbyor byed shes ldan zhing/ /phul du byung bar bags byed pa/ /de bzhin nyid kyi bden pa
81a6(rgyud 'grel): shes/ /shes rab shes rab ces brjod bya /thabs kyi sgra yis de nyid de/ /dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid can/ /gang gis de yi rang bzhin bya/ /rnal 'byor pa rtag rnal 'byor rig/ rgyud kyi sgra yis ci brjod bya/ /rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes brjod de//
81a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba rgyud du 'dod pa yin/ /de nyid gsang dang gsang chen zhes/ /phyi ma'i rgyud du brjod par bya zhes so/ da ni lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang/ /don mnyam rnam pa mang po rig/ rengs par byed dang skrod pa nyid/ /sde rengs byed dang mngon spyod
81b1(rgyud 'grel): dang/ /? pa gsal par bya ste/ lta stangs dgu ba zhes pa ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga dgug pa'o/ /brda chen ni 'dra ba'i ngo bo'o/ /don mnyam zhes pa ni thams cad dbyer med pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /rnam mang zhes pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs
81b2(rgyud 'grel): bas ye shes bskyed nas sna tshogs pa lta bar byed pa'o/ /rengs par byed pa ces pa ni dbang po rnams ye shes su dmigs pa'o/ /skrod pa ces bya ba ni gzugs rdo rje la sogs pa rnams kyi gnas gcod pa'o/ /sde ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rgyun
81b3(rgyud 'grel): gyi ngo bo ste/ /mngon spyod ni 'di rnams dag pas gzhan gsal nas sems kyi rdo rje la rab tu bcug ste rengs par byed do/ /ces pa ni/ sde rengs byed dang mngon spyod dang zhes pa'o/ da ni rnal 'byor ma rnams bskyed pa dang/ gnas pa'i rgyu brjod
81b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya ste/ rgyud 'dir rnal 'byor ma rnams ni phung po lnga rnams dang/ khams bzhi rnams dang/ skye mched drug rnams te/ zla ba'i cha bco lnga'i dbye bas bdag med ma la sogs pa rnams so/ /de rnams kyi skyed pa dang gnas pa'i rgyu'o/ /de las de rnams kyi don
81b5(rgyud 'grel): mnyam shes pa rnam shes dang/ lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba'o ru 'gyur ro/ /'di rnams kyi rgyas par bstan pa le'u brgyad par brjod par bya'o/ /de ni kye'i rdo rje'i skye ba dang gnas pa'i byed rgyu brjod par bya'o/ /dang por re zhig gcig 'gyur zhes pa/ e baM
81b6(rgyud 'grel): gi yi ge ni he ru ka'i dang po'i byed rgyu'o/ /hUM yig ni gnyis pa'i skyed pa'i byed rgyu'o/ zhes pa nges pa'o/ /de las dngos po 'byung ba ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bye brag las/ /yul dang dbang po'i sbyor ba yis/ rnam shes rnams kyi so so'o/ /dngos
81b7(rgyud 'grel): po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur/ /dngos po'i 'ching ba des rnam par yang shes pa rnams dang/ mig la sogs pa rnams 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ /de yongs shes pas grol bar 'gyur/ /yul dang dbang po de rnams 'gog pas de yongs su
82a1(rgyud 'grel): shes pas zhes pa'o/ /de'i phyir/ dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur/ zhes pa lha'i mig la sogs pa rnams kyis 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i yul mthong bas rnam par shes pa ba drug rnams grol lo/ /dpal
82a2(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i le'ur gsungs pa yang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba gnang bar mdzad pa ma yin te/ gang 'das pa de ni zad pa 'gags pas bral
82a3(rgyud 'grel): bar rnam par gyur pa'o/ /gang ma 'ongs pa de yang ma thob pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba ni gnas pa dmigs su med pa'o zhes so/ /de bzhin du lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang lha'i sna dang/ gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa
82a4(rgyud 'grel): dang/ rdzu 'phrul te mngon par shes pa drug rnams so/ /de'i phyir rnam par zhes pa la sos pa gzhan rnams so/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las so/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su gsungs pa yang/ shes rab ye shes rab
82a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin las gang bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par 'gyur/ /lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis ma mthong ba dang srid rnam gsum yan mthong bar 'gyur/ /lha yi rna ba'i mthu las srog chags kyis brjod snying dang kha yi sgra ni thos
82a6(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi spyod las mi yi gag? por gyel sogs thams cad 'gyur zhes so/ /de bzhin du gzugs gzhan no la sogs pa yang ste/ de'i phyir/ thams cad nas ni phyag zhabs sogs/ thams cad du ni spyan zhal dbu/ /kun nas
82a7(rgyud 'grel): thos ldan 'jig rten du/ /thams cad la ni khyab nas bzhugs zhes pa'o/ /da ni sngar bshad pa'i shes rab dang thabs dag gi don dam pa'i sgom pa brjod par bya ste/ dngos po bsgom bya shes pa la sogs pa'o/ /'dir nam mkha' la dngos po bsgom
82b1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni rmi lam lta bu ste /rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa'o/ /de yongs su shes pas ni dngos po med pa bsgom par bya ste/ rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis snang brnyan snang ba/ rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul ba ni mngon sum zhes brjod par bya'o/ /nam mkha' 
82b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni shes rab a yig tu 'gyur la de bzhin he ru ka zhes pa dngos po med par bsgom bya ste/ shes rab kyi ye shes su 'gyur ro/ /he ru ka ni bde ba chen po ste shes rab ji lta bar thabs kyang de bzhin no/ /de yongs su shes pas dngos po med pa yang bsgom
82b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba ste/ thabs su 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gyi sgra las rgyu ji lta ba de ltar 'bras bu'o zhes pa'o/ /dpal mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis par yang gsungs pa/ stong pa las byung gzugs brnyan rgyu/ /mi 'gyur las skyes bde ba 'bras//
82b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyu la 'bras bu rgyas btab cing/ /'bras bu rgyu yis rgyas btab pa'o/ /stong nyid gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa rgyu/ /snying rje 'gyur med 'bras bu'o/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems su de brjod bya ces so/ /slar yang de nyid du gsungs
82b5(rgyud 'grel): pa/ 'bras bu rgyu yis phan chun du/ /gzhan dang gzhan la rgyas btab med/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad gang/ /de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung/ /shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min/ /lhan skyes shes rab dang lhan cig/ kun nas yongs su bde ba rdzogs//
82b6(rgyud 'grel): sgrib ba thams cad spangs pa'i zhes so/ /dpal sam+bu Tar yang gsungs pa/ spros pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /shes rab ces par yongs su bsgrags/ /yid bzhin nor ltar ma lus pa'i/ /sems can don mdzad snying rje'o/ /dmigs med gnas su shes rab dang//
82b7(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med snying rje chen po ni/ /blo dang lhan cig cig gyur pa/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' i ji lta ba'o zhes so/ /de bzhin du 'di nyid du yang gsungs pa/ phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las/ /rnal 'byor snying rje thabs su 'gyur/ /stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa/ /byang chub sems
83a1(rgyud 'grel): shes bshad pa'o/ /dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang gsungs pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa/ chos thams cad ni stong pa/ chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/ chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa/ chos thams
83a2(rgyud 'grel): cad ni 'dus byas pa dang bral ba/ chos thams cad ni skye ba dang bral ba/ chos thams cad ni 'gyur ba med pa rnams so zhes so/ /dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du yang gsungs pa/ rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /dngos po med cing sgom pa'ang med/ /
83a3(rgyud 'grel): rnam rtog med par mos pa yis/ /brtag bya thams cad brtag par bya/ /rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la/ /sems can don la yongs su brtag /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams kun/ /chos min chos nyid kyang ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa
83a4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o/ /e waM gi yi ge shes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyid can ni lus gnas te lte bar gnas pa'o/ /de ltar na/ lus gnas ye shes chen po ni/ /kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs/ zhes pa grub ste dkyil 'khor gyi
83a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dang las dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rtog pa dang bral ba'o/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa/ bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang gang na rnams dang/ /sbyin sreg sngags kyi rab gnas
83a6(rgyud 'grel): tshon la rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drang bskul ba med par yang/ /bud med sbyor rnams spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag bde ba phyag rgya'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ /de phyir de ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis thar pa'i rgyur bsgom bya zhes so//
83a7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par rtogs pa dang bral ba mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba'o/ /'di'i don ni 'di yin te dpal rdo rje rtse mor yang gsungs pa/ nyan thos rang rgyal phyi rol gyi/ /shes rab las ni mchog tu bshad/ /pha rol de bzhin nyid
83b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhol 'di/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par bshad/ /de nyid dmar zhes shes 'gyur ba/ /slar yang chos kyi rtog pa med/ chad pa rtag par sgra ba ni/ /de bzhin nyid gzhan zhes par bya ces pa nges pa'o/ /de kho na ni rdo rje sems dpa' 'jig rten gsum
83b2(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba'i he ru ka ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o/ /dngos po kun la khyad pa po ces pa ni/ /phung po drug ni gzugs la sogs/ /rnam shes mthar thug snying rje che/ /dbang po dang ni yul nyid dang/ /dbang po rnam par shes pa nyid/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams go bya'i ched
83b3(rgyud 'grel): khams ni bco brgyad rnams su bshad/ /dngos po 'di rnams la khyab par byed pa ye shes kyi sku'o/ /lus la gnas kyang lus skyes min zhes pa skye ba dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir te/ dpal sam+bu Ta ru gsungs pa/ /gang tshe las kyi lus zhig na
83b4(rgyud 'grel): de 'dra ba yi lha ru 'gyur/ /ji srid las dang las min 'gyur/ /de srid lus la rnam par gnas zhes so/ /da ni rdo rje'i lus la rtsa rnams bshad par bya ste/ 'dir rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags/ bcom ldan
83b5(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'dzag pa rnams so shes pa/ 'dir bde ba chen po zhes pa ni bde ba chen po myong bar byed pa'i phyir bde ba chen por
83b6(rgyud 'grel): brjod par bya'o/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa/ dang por mdza' dag rgyal ba'i lus ni dngos grub rgyu ru sngags pas yang dag bsrung bar bya/ /lus med na ni dngos grub med cing skye ba 'di la mchog bde thob par 'gyur ba'ang med
83b7(rgyud 'grel): de phyir lus kyi don rgyur nyin zhag so so'i dus su rtsa yi sbyor ba bsgom par bya/ /lus ni grub na gzhan pa'i dngos grub srid gsum gnas su dag gzhug nyid du rab tu 'gyur zhes so/ /dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od tu yang gsungs pa/ 'og tu phyogs
84a1(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi 'bab ba sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams brjod par bya ste /mi phyed ma la sogs ba rnams so shes pa ste/ 'dir yar ngo la dbyangs bco lnga'i cha rnams te/ bcu drug pa ni thig le'o/ /rtsa de rnams kyis 'phyang ma la bskor nas gnas so//
84a2(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste /tshes gcig dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang lnga pa ste/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /de bzhin du yon tan rnams ni drug pa la sogs pa rnams la ri ba ji lta ba bzhin no/ /ya Na ru bsgyur ba rnams ni bcu gcig pa la sogs
84a3(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /thig le ni dbus su ste bcu drug pa 'phyang ma'o/ /de ltar rkang las steng du dpral bar khu ba'i cha'i rang bzhin gyi bdud rtsi 'dzag ste phyi rol tu bsil ba dang nang du khu ba'o/ /de bzhin du rtsa so so ste/ 'di lta ste/
84a4(rgyud 'grel): mi phyed ma dang phra gzugs ma/ /mchog ma g.yon pa thung dus/ /zhes pa tshes gcig la sogs pa lnga rnams so/ /de nas ru sbal skyes sgom dbang bskur ma/ /skyon ldan ma dang bshad ma zhes pa drug pa la sogs pa rnams so/ /ma mo mtshan mo
84a5(rgyud 'grel): bsil sbyin ma/ /drong bskyed ma dang la la nA zhes pa bcu gcig ba la sogs ba rnams te rim pa ji lta ba bzhin no/ /la la nA bco lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang/ a ba d+hU tI ni bcu drug pa ste dga' ba bcu drug rnam par dag pas dkar po'i phyogs la lhan cig
84a6(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa ma nyams pa'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o/ /de nas nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa rnams ra sa nA'i tshes bco lnga rnams te/ 'di rnams kyi dbus su ra sa nA la sogs pa rnams so/ /'di lta ste ro ma dang 'bab ma dang/ mdog
84a7(rgyud 'grel): gnag ma dang/ spyi ma dang/ rgyu sbyin ma rnams zhes pa rnams ni/ tshes gcig la sogs pa lnga rnams so /sbyor bral ma dang/ sdug gu ma dang/ grub ma dang/ 'chod ma dang/ yid bzangs ma ces pa drug pa la sogs rnams so/ /sum skor ma dang
84b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod mam dang khyim dang gtum mo dang/ kAtya ya ni ces pa bcu gcig pa la sogs pa ste de ltar bco lnga ni nag po'i phyogs la cha nyams pa'o/ /lce'i dbus su bdud bral ma skud pa nag po'i rang bzhin gyis lce'i rtse mor byung ba ro 'dzag tu 'jug pa bcu drug pa rnam
84b2(rgyud 'grel): bar bcad pa'o/ /de'i phyir rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis yongs su spang bar mi bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /dpal sam+bu Tar yang gsungs pa/ 'khor lo bzhi yi rab dbye bas/ /bcu phrag gnyis lhag brgya yin te/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyis/ /rtsa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis
84b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog ces so/ /slar yang de nyid du gsungs pa/ byang chub sems ni sum cu gnyis/ /gang tshe 'dir ni gang bar 'gyur/ /dbang po phung po 'byung ba rnams/ /de ma thag tu sangs rgyas nyid ces so/ /'di'i don ni 'di lta ste dpal mchog gi dang po'i
84b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis par yang gsungs pa/ shes rab chags pas zhu ba yi/ /thig le rim pas mgo bo las/ /rdzogs pa'i gnas su bzhugs pa rnams/ /'ching ba dam pa'i don las so/ /ji ltar zla shar rim pa yis/ /cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs
84b5(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur/ /grib ma nyams pa rdzogs pa ste/ /zla ba cha dang rdzogs pa min/ /de bzhin ye shes skyes rim pas/ /sa rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs la sogs nyams pa rdzogs/ /ye shes chad dang rdzogs pa min zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /rdo rje
84b6(rgyud 'grel): snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rtsa rnams ci lta bu lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad rnams/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ /thams cad rnams zhes pa ni phung po dang dbang po yongs su
84b7(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa rnams so/ /yang na thabs ni thams cad kyis/ /dngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtags zhes pa ni gsungs pa yang nye ba'i rtsa rnams du ma'i khams/ lus bkang nas ni legs gnas pa/ /stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis po/ /de snyed de rnams lha rnams so
85a1(rgyud 'grel): shes so/ /da ni sdom pa'i dbye bas bshad par bya ste/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang gsungs pa/ /rang gi mtshan ma lha mo'i pad?/ /gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan rnams kyis/ /bzhag bya rtag tu mchod par bya/ /yang dang yang du 'dod
85a2(rgyud 'grel): pa bya/ /de ltar bshad pa lha mo yi/ /sdom pa bde ba mchog tu 'dod/ /'dir yang gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni/ /e waM yi ger rab tu gnas zhes so/ /A li dang kA li dang zla ba dang nyi ma dang shes rab dang thabs zhes pa la sogs pa 'di'i
85a3(rgyud 'grel): don ni 'di yin te/ dpal gdan bzhi par yang gsungs pa/ kA li rdo rje zhes bshad de/ /A li yang de bzhin gshegs ma'o/ /A li kA li'i rab sbyor gyis/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /mdza' dag sems can don nyid kyang 'di lta'i
85a4(rgyud 'grel): ngo bos 'grub par bya/ /shes rab thabs las phyi gyur rnams/ /'khor ba las sgrol ga la zhig ces so/ /ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang/ /sdom pa de ni rab tu gsal/ /bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che/ /rdo rje skye mched thabs yin te/ /gsang ba'i snyoms par
85a5(rgyud 'grel): 'jug pa 'dis/ /phyi rol gnyis gnyis bstan pa min/ /sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni/ /'khor lo'i ngo bos brjod par bya/ /sku gsum yongs su shes pa ni/ /bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor 'dod/ /chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang/ /de bzhin bde ba
85a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po nyid/ /skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bo la/ /sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas/ /ma lus pa yi sems can gyi/ /skye ba gang du rab brjod pa/ /der ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur te/ gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan no/ /gang gis skyed dang sprul byed pa
85a7(rgyud 'grel): sku ni sbrul pa pa ru bshad/ /chos ni sems kyi rang bzhin te/ chos kyi sku ni snying gar 'gyur/ /ro rnams drug gi rang bzhin gyi/ /bza' ba yang dag longs spyod brjod/ /mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo ste/ /bde ba chen po spyi bor gnas/ /e waM
85b1(rgyud 'grel): yi ger rgyu mthun te/ /rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo la/ /skyes bu'i byed pa'i longs spyod la/ /bde ba 'khor lor dri ma med/ /rgyu mthun sogs kyis rnam phye ba/ /'bras bu rnam pa bzhi ru brjod/ /ji ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod/ /rgyu mthun zhes par bsgrags pa yin/ /rnam par smin pa de las
85b2(rgyud 'grel): bzlog /las chud 'bras bu cha ba'o/ /rnal 'byor dag pas dri ma med/ /skyes bu'i byed pa nyer bsgrubs pa'o/ /sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas brtan pa/ /gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyin/ /thams cad yod smra chos 'khor lor/ /chos ni smra pa yang dag 'byung/ /longs
85b3(rgyud 'grel): spyod 'khor lor kun bskur te/ gang phyir mgrin par kun rig byed/ /bde ba'i 'khor lo rang gi 'dun cho/ /gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas phyir/ /'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi par dang/ 'dab ma brgyad par dang/ 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis par dang/ /'dab ma bcu drug
85b4(rgyud 'grel): par te/ lte ba dang/ snying kha dang/ mgrin pa dang/ dpral ba la'o/ /dpral bar longs spyod do/ /mgrin par dbang byed do/ /snying gar thim pa'o/ lte bar bdag po nyid do/ de lta thams cad bzhi'o zhes pa la sogs pa na/ ji lta ba bzhin du rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas/ rgyud ni rgyud
85b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du gsungs pa'i rnam pas rigs drug gi dbye bas 'khor lo drug rnams su sdom pa'o/ /rigs lnga'i dbye bas rigs lnga rnams su sdom pa'o/ /rigs gsum la sogs pa'i dbye bas rigs gsum rnams su sdom pa'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o/ /da ni gtum mo'i
85b6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor brjod par bya ste/ /lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te/ /spyan sogs rnams kyi yang bsregs te/ /bsregs nas ri bong can haM 'dzag /ces pa mdor bstan pa'i tshig 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa'i tshig /dpal mtshan yang
85b7(rgyud 'grel): dag par brjod par gsungs pa/ nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba/ /shes rab ye shes me'o che/ /'od chen rnam par snang bar byed/ /ye shes snang ba lam me ba ces so/ /dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du yang gsungs pa/ gtum mo'i de kho na nyid las me ste de'i mgo bo ni
86a1(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer yin la/ /de'i mgo bo'i steng dpral bar zla ba lta bur byang chub kyi sems skye ba'i gnas su bzhag par bya ba zhu bar gyur te/ gang dang gang thig le sems kyi thig le zhu ba dpral ba nas mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba dang gsang bar son zhing 'gag
86a2(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur la/ srog rtsol gyi me yis lus kyi thig le gsang bar 'gags pa'o/ /bdud rtsi khu ba'i gzugs can ni/ /thig le'i gzugs kyis 'dzag par byed/ /thig le'i rnal 'byor zhes par bshad/ /bcu drug phyed phyed thig le 'chang/ /cha med cha las 'das
86a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang/ phra me'i rnal 'byor zhes par bshad/ /rgyu mthun la sogs steng du 'gro zhes so/ /dpal 'dus par yang gsungs pa/ rin chen chen po kha dog lnga/ /yungs kar gyi ni 'bru tshed tsam/ /sna yi rtse mor 'bad pa yis/ /rnal 'byor rig pas
86a4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bsgom/ /dpal 'dus pa phyi mar yang gsungs pa/ ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs/ 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can/ /gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni/ /sna yi rtse mor rnam par bsgom zhes pa ste/ 'dir ni rin chen lnga'i sgras ra sa nA dkyil 'khor lnga'i chos can
86a5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa khams lnga po rnams so/ /de'i rang bzhin can gyi dbugs ni/ rin chen lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs shes pa ste sna bug g.yas pa la'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni la la nA dkyil 'khor lnga'i chos can rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i phung po lnga rnams so/ /de rnams
86a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbugs ni sna bug g.yon pa la'o zhes so/ /gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung nas ni zhes pa 'dir gong bu ni g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid dbu ma d+hU tIr gcig pa nyid kyi srog gi rlung zhes pa'o/ /srog gi rlung de gong bu'i gzugs kyis phyung
86a7(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /sna'i rtse mor rnam sgom bya ces pa/ 'dir sna'i sgras ni lte ba dang snying kha dang/ mgrin pa dang dpral ba dang/ gtsug tor gyi pad+ma'i ze 'bru brjod de/ /de'i rtse mor bsgom par bya ba ni/ sna'i rtse mor bsgom par bya ba'o/ /dpal rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa/ sna rtser yungs kar zhes bya
86b1(rgyud 'grel): pa/ srog dang rtsol bar brtag pa ste/ /srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa/ /'od lnga rnams su sangs rgyas gsungs/ /mgrin pa snying ga lte ba dang/ gsang ba'i pad+mar 'gro 'ong ston/ /thun phyed dus su rnam par gnas/ /rgyu ba'i rim pa ji lta bar/ /de ltar ze 'bru'i lte ba'i dbus su thig le'i gnas su gong bu'i
86b2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyis srog 'gags pa'o zhes pa'o/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa/ zla ba nyi ma'i rgyu ba nyams shing lam gnyis kyi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po 'gags/ /chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs can la rab zhugs/ /dngos dang dngos med gcig
86b3(rgyud 'grel): gyur rnam gsum srid pa la gnas gzhom med legs par rang rtogs pa/ /de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa de gang la gnyis med ci yang med pa mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ces so/ /'di nyid du yang gsungs pa/ sbrul pa'i 'khor lor dbyu gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
86b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lor dbyu gu gnyis kyi bdag nyid can/ chu tshod sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la chu tshod gnyis kyi bdag nyid can 'pho ba bcu drug dang/ chos kyi 'khor lor thun tshod brgyad do/ /de ltar na nyin zhag la dbugs 'byung ba dang 'jug pa drug brgya lhag pa'i stong
86b5(rgyud 'grel): phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig rnams so/ /gzhung mangs pa'i 'jigs pas 'dir bdag gis grangs ma byas so ces pa dpal kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud la kha che chen pos rtogs par byed pa zab mo'i rdo rje'i tshig 'byed pa'i snying po'i bsdus pa'i dka' 'grel du rdo rje rigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// //
86b6(rgyud 'grel): da ni sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o/ /sngags zhes pa ni de kho na nyid kyi don shes par byed pa'i phyir men te 'gro ba skyob par byed pa'i phyir pa'o? zhes pa man+ta ste ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems so zhes pa'i don to/ /'di lta ste/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags
86b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa thams cad kyang de yin la/ 'byung ba po yang ngo zhes pa 'byung po thams cad de rnams kyi sngags ni rim pa ji lta ba dang/ grangs ji lta ba'o/ /oM a kI ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM Adya nu ta oM A:hUM swAhA ces pa 'dir a yig gi sgra yis gzhom du med pa'i sgra ste/ gsungs pa
87a1(rgyud 'grel): yang/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a yig 'byung/ /a yig yig 'bru kun gyi mchog don chen 'gyur med dam pa ste/ srog chen po ni skye ba med/ tshig tu brjod pa slangs pa ste zhes pa la sogs par rig par bya'o/ de skad du yang rtsa ba'i rgyud du gsungs so/ /sa la
87a2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i 'byung ba rnams la skyes pa ni 'gyur po rnams te/ phung po lnga'i ngo bo'i chos can no/ /de rnams kyi sngags ni phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can gyi yi ge lnga ste/ oM yig gis de rnams kyi gzugs kyi phung po sku rdo rje'o/ /a yig gis 'du shes kyi phung po ste gsungs
87a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'o/ /hUM yig gis rnam par shes pa'i phung po thugs rdo rje'o/ /swA yig gis tshor ba'i phung po'o/ hA yig gis 'du byed kyi phung po'o/ 'di'i nges pa'i don ni dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u bcu par gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
87a4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ni/ gal te gzugs kyi 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i
87a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzugs kyis yongs su nyams pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes
87a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /chos ma yin pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ltar na 'di'i
87a7(rgyud 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes so/ /de rnams la gtor ma ni tshim par byed pa'o/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa bon rnams rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'di lta ste/ oM yig gis rnam par snang mdzad spyi bor ro/ /oM yig
87b1(rgyud 'grel): gi rin chen 'byung ldan te/ lte ba ro/ /h+ri(rgyud 'grel): yig gis 'od dpag med de 'grin par ro/ /gsang bar khaM yig gis don yod grub ba'o/ /hUM yig gis mi bskyod pa ste snying khar ro/ /de ltar pi tsu badzra'i lus la dgod par byas nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi yang nges pa'o/ /de nas phyag bcu drug pa'i
87b2(rgyud 'grel): nges pa ni/ oM de ba pi tsu badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ 'dir nges pa'i tshig ni/ oM yig gi lha rnams kyi gdan yin pa ji lta ba de ltar sngags kyi yi ge dang pos lha 'grub pa'o/ /sprul pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis sems can gyi don gyi dor rtse bar byed/ rol bar byed pas na lha'o/ /thugs rje'i yan
87b3(rgyud 'grel): lag gis pi tsu ste shin tu dang po nyid kyi phyir ro/ /rdo rje ni mi phyed pa nyid kyi phyir te/ shes rab dang thabs kyi yan lag gis so/ /sngags 'di ni phyag bcu drug pa'i 'o/ /grong khyer gcig dkrugs pa ni grong khyer gyi sgra yis bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo brjod par bya ste/ de yang dag par
87b4(rgyud 'grel): bskyod pa'i rang bzhin las rnam pa gzhan nyid na grong khyer bskyed pa'o/ /de nyid dbang du 'gyur ba ni/ byams pa la dmigs pas gang yin pa ste/ de'i phyir rnal 'byor pas sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o/ /zhes pa nges pa'i don to/ drang ba'i don gyi ni go sla'o/ /oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya
87b5(rgyud 'grel): sha swAhA/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi sa bon ni/ a A(rgyud 'grel): i a'i u a'u ri rI li lI(rgyud 'grel): e i o aau aM/ 'di'i nges pa'i don ni cha bcu drug rnams/ dga' ba'i rim pa'i dbye bas rtogs par bya'o/ /phyag gnyis pa'i/ oM trai lokyA k+She pa huM huM huM phaT swAhA/ phyag bzhi pa'i/ oM dzwa la
87b6(rgyud 'grel): dzwa la b+hyo huM huM huM phaT swAhA/ phyag drug pa'i/ oM ki Ti ki Ti badzra hUM hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags ni/ oM A:hUM/ da ni ku ru kul+le'i sngags brjod par bya ste/ dpral bar oM mo/ lce la h+rI'o/ /mgrin par ku'o/ snying gar ru'o/ lte bar ku'o
87b7(rgyud 'grel): gsang bar l+le'o zhes ba dgod pa'o/ dbugs 'jug pas bkang ste/ bzlas pa 'bum phrag gcig byas nas/ dbugs 'byung ba'i dus su bgrang phreng bskyod par mi bya'o/ /'di'i nges pa'i don ni phyag rgya lnga'i man ngag gi le'ur bshad par bya'o/ zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pas
88a1(rgyud 'grel): ces pa la/ zla ba ces pa ni g.yon pa'i rtsa rkyang ma'o/ /nyi ma zhes pa ni ro ma rtsa g.yas pa ste gnyis po dag gi 'char ba dang/ nub pa dang 'jug pa dang phyir 'byung ba 'pho ba 'grogs pa'i phyir zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pa'o zhes pa'o/ /drang
88a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i don gyis ni go sla'o/ /sngags kyi tshig rnams thams cad la dang po oM yig dang hUM phaT yig spel ba rtogs par bya'o/ /'dir sngags btu ba'i le'ur hUM dang phaT yig ni man ngag las shes par bya'o/ /'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud du rim pa dang rim pa las
88a3(rgyud 'grel): bzlog pas thams cad slob dpon gdug pa can rnams la sbas te bla ma dam pa brgyud pa'i rim pas shes par bya'i/ /glegs bam klog pas ni ma yin no/ /gzhan thams cad rgyud gzhan bltas nas gang rigs pas 'thad cing rgyud mang po dang mthun pa'i bcom
88a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi gsung gzung bar bya'i dad pas rmongs pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no/ /de skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ nga'i gsung gi thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba'o/ /gsungs pa yang/ thog ma med nas spros med bdag /de bzhin nyid dag dag
88a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag /bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ /gnyis su med dang gnyis med gsungs/ /yang dag mdza' la rnam par gnas zhes so/ /de ltar slar yang/ dang po dge ba bar dang tha mar mi dge ba ma yin zhing dang po dang bar du mi dge zhing
88a6(rgyud 'grel): tha mar dge ba/ ji ltar byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyis kun tu brtags pa/ dang po rnam par rtog pa'i sgom pa dang/ bar du dbang po gnyis kyi bde ba bsgom pa dang/ mthar rnam par mi rtog pa bsgom pa ste/ bde ba chen po bsgom pa'o/ zhes pa de ni ngan pa'i tshig ste
88a7(rgyud 'grel): thams cad du rgyu dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu mthong gi /ko tre wa yi sa bon las/ /sA lu'i myu gu 'byung med phyir/ /rnam rtog sa bon las 'byung ba/ /rnam rtog bcas pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur/ /rnam par mi rtog las skyes pa/ /rnam par mi rtog 'bras bur 'gyur/ /rgyu de'i phyir/ dang por dge
88b1(rgyud 'grel): ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba'o/ /ji ltar sa bon de bzhin ljon/ /ji ltar sdong po de bzhin 'bras/ /'jig rten 'di kun tu mthong ste/ /de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung nyid/ /da ni rengs pa dang dbang du bya ba la sogs pa las rab 'byam gsungs pa/ oM hUM swAhA/ rengs par byed
88b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ /de bzhin du dbang du bya ba dang/ de bzhin du skrod pa dang/ de bzhin du sdang bar byed pa dang/ mngon spyod dang 'gugs pa dang gsod pa ces pa la sogs pa gsal bar bya ste/ kye'i rdo rjes rtsa rgyud du/ ji ltar bdag la gsal gsungs pa/ /de
88b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin nyung rgyud 'di ru ni/ /bkas gnang ba las de brjod bya/ /sa yi sa bon gyis rengs byed/ /rmongs dang phur gdab de bzhin no/ /rtag tu zhi byed chu'i sa bon/ /de bzhin rgyas dang dug med byed/ /me yi sa bon chen po 'gugs/ /dbang dang bskyod pa rnam kun tu'o/ /sdang
88b4(rgyud 'grel): byed bskrad pa rlung rnams kyis/ /de bzhin du ni dug 'pho ba'o/ /stong pa'i sa bon gyis dug gcod/ /de bzhin gsod dang 'tsho ba byed/ /gso dang bslang dang dga' ba ni/ /ye shes sa bon gyis grub byed/ /lkugs pa nyid dang 'on nyid dang/ /ma ning byed pa nyid kyang ni/ /thugs
88b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung sku yi sa bon gyis/ /sngags pas rim pa ji bzhin bsgrub/ /sa chu me rlung stong pa dang/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor las/ /rengs pa la sogs las rnams ni/ /sgrub po mchog gis bsgrub par bya/ /'di yi don ni 'di yin te/ /sa chu me rlung stong pa dang/
88b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes pa ni 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid can byang chub sems kyi thig le'o/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba las/ zhes pa byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le de nyid dpral ba las mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba dang rdo rje pad+ma'i ze 'bru'i rtse mor ma 'phos pa bde ba chen pos
88b7(rgyud 'grel): yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas ni rengs pa dang dbang du bya ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed do ces pa nges pa'i don to/ /da ni rengs pa la sogs pa rnams 'grub pa'i gnas gsungs so/ /gsungs pa yang/ ri bo tshang tshing sman ljongs dang/ /rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram
89a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang/ /gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod te/ /gnas 'di rnams su bya ba yin/ /sngags bzlas de bzhin bsam gtan dang/ /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa dang/ /rab gnas las kyi ngo bo yis/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par
89a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ 'di'i don ni 'di yin te/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gror yang gsungs pa/ nags chen zhes pa 'dod chags sogs/ /nyon mongs shing gis gtibs pa ste/ /bud med phyag rgya bsten pa'i thabs/ /dag pas byang chub phyogs su 'gyur/ /de yang rnam par dag
89a3(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ /rab kyi mthar thug son pa las/ /yul phyogs chos 'byung zhes pa'o/ /de nyid de bzhin gshegs kun gyis/ /rab sngags rdo rje'i rigs sogs kyis/ /khyad 'phags gzhon nu ma yi rigs/ /las byung nyid kyi skye bos dben/ /de kho na g.yo ba med pa'i
89a4(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro'o/ /sems can dman pa rnams kyis 'jug pa mi nus pa nyid kyi phyir tshang tshing ngo/ /mdzod du gyur pa nyid kyi phyir sman ljongs so/ /'gram rnams su shes pa de dang yang dag par sbyor ba'i shes rab kyi rgya mtsho'i 'gram
89a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams su ste/ mtshungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi rgyud dang du long ba ni dud khrod do/ /gdod nas grub pa zhes pa rtag tu grub cing yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ 'char ba dang nub pa dang bral ba'o/ /thal ba yis rtag tu bde ba chen po'i rnam par thob cing de'i rang  
89a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du bya ba ste/ de ltar na sgra'i bden pa nyid rtogs par byed do/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa/ bskyed mos tshal lam ri bo skye bo ri dags bral bar zhi ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ /drag po rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog rnams su
89a7(rgyud 'grel): rengs dang rmongs pa yang/ /dbang dang dgugs pa sngags pas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab sbyor la/ /gnas gzhan skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyis ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur zhes so/ /yang de nyid du gsungs pa/ skyes bu
89b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis phran tshogs rigs pa la rjes chags/ /rig pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mdza' dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o/ /zhes pa'i bsam pa brkam chags sems kyis ye shes sbyin pa rnam
89b2(rgyud 'grel): par spangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug /rgyab tu rdzas dang rang gi khyim thab gzhan gyi dbang 'gyur kye ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug ces so/ /de bzhin du dpal dgongs pa lung ston pa'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa/ so sor sdud dang dmigs par bshad//
89b3(rgyud 'grel): brda dang don dam pa yin no/ /so sor sdud pa spyi yin te/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni dmigs pa nyid/ /brda ni sngags kyi de nyid bshad/ /de bzhin nyid ni don dam pa'o/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa/ khyim dang grong du bgrang phreng rnams kyis nyin dang mtshan du sngags kyi bzlas pa byas
89b4(rgyud 'grel): nas ni/ /ngal zhing rmongs te chags bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa brjod par byed/ /gnas dang stod pa dus dang mchog gi mtshan mo la gnas yang dag par ni shes min nyid/ /rkang pa'i sor mor rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis
89b5(rgyud 'grel): ni rab byug byed pa bzhin zhes so/ /dpal sam bu Tar yang gsungs pa/ nang gi dbye ba 'di nyid ni/ /shin tu gsal bar bla ma yi/ zhal las rnyed 'gyur gang rnams ni/ /bla mas dman pa'i sems can rnams/ /sngags dang phyag rgya mi rnyed do/ /de phyir 'dzam gling gru
89b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa/ dag pa sangs rgyas bzhugs pa 'dir/ /e yig dbyibs can gang dbus su/ /ji ltar e wam du 'gyur bar/ gru gsum dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bar/ /rdo rje rol pa rnams spros 'byung/ /chos 'byung zhes ni bshad pa ste/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga zhes kyang ngo/ /
89b7(rgyud 'grel): de yi dbus son pad+ma ni/ /'dab ma brgyad pa ze 'brur bcas/ /der ni A li kA li spel/ /sde tshan brgyad rnams rnam par gnas/ /las kyi tshogs rnams byed pa ste/ /gsang sngags gzugs kyis lus can gyi'o/ /yi ge lnga bcu rnams nyid ni/ /rig byed sogs su
90a1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa rnams/ /phyag rgya nyid dang rgyud rnams dang/ /phyi rol bstan bcos ngo bor ro/ /rdo rje snying po 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin rnams ni lus gzhan cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no/ /a ka tsa Ta ta pa la sha'i sde dga' ba yi ge lnga bcu ru mnyam
90a2(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams/ /rdo rje rol pa pad+mar son pa rnams 'dab ma so so la phyogs brgyad rnams su rig par byas pa'o/ /'di rnams dbus su ze 'bru las/ /mchog gi dbang phyug yod pa yin/ /sde tshan brgyad kyis bskor byas pa'o/ mchog gi yi ge nyid kyang ngo//
90a3(rgyud 'grel): a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /don chen yi ge'i 'dren pa ste/ /lus can rnams kyi sngags kun ni/ /de nyid las ni yang dag 'byung zhes so/ /gsungs pa yang/ brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog /dag kun rab tu 'od gsal ba'o/ zhes so/ /de bzhin du/
90a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal rdo rje snying po'i rgyan du yang gsungs pa/ snying gi dbus su gzhom med pa/ /sgron ma 'bar ba dang mtshungs shing/ /mi 'gyur mchog tu phra ba yi/ /a yi gdam pa gtso bo'i zhes so/ /dpal mtshan yang dag par brjod par yang gsungs pa/ 'gro ba'i mar me
90a5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes sgron/ gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba/ /rig pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po/ /gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed ces/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'dir/ /A li'i gzugs kyis 'jug par 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa yang ngo
90a6(rgyud 'grel): dpal lang kar gshegs par yang gsungs pa/ skyes bu gang la la zhig sgron ma gzung nas nor tshol bar byed do/ /blo gros chen po de bzhin du ngag tu rnam par brtag pa'i sgra'i sgron mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dag
90a7(rgyud 'grel): tu rtog pa dang bral ba'i so sor rang gi bdag nyid rtogs pa la rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes so/ /dpal dgongs pa lung ston pa'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa/ dang po gcig pu dgu dbus na/ gang zhig bcu yis mi 'ching ba/ /de ni bcing med shes bya ste/ de
90b1(rgyud 'grel): shes pa ni mchog gi gnas/ /dbyangs dang gsal byed yi ge rnams/ /gangs dgu yi ni rjes 'jug pa/ /as bcings phan tshun yang dge sbyor/ /gang zhig rig dang 'gro ba'i bla/ /dpal 'dus pa phyi mar yang gsungs pa/ rig pa'i tshul gyi cho ga yis/ /thun
90b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams bzhi yi sbyor ba las/ /sngags kyi yan lag dbyer med pa/ /mtshon bya mtshan nyid bral ba bzlas/ /gnyis su med pa mnyam pa rnam par rgyal ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud du gsungs pa yang/ /rnam par shes las yang dag 'byung/ /mtshan nyid
90b3(rgyud 'grel): drug ldan gsal sngags zer/ /gsang sngags 'bum phrag drug bzlas nas/ /rdo rje sems dpar phyag byas te/ zla ba nya la de 'grub 'gyur zhes so/ /'di yi don ni 'di yin te/ /dpal mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa/ /bde ba chen po'i
90b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin ni/ nya yi sgra yis brjod par bya/ /gzhan ni sgom pa'i bar chod can/ /spro dang bsgrub byed pa kun/ /zhes pa la sogs pa'o/ /de la brtul zhugs bshad pa med/ /sngags dang phreng ba yod ma yin/ /'dzin dang sbyin sreg las kun med/ /thams cad
90b5(rgyud 'grel): gzhan dang gzhan du 'jug /rnal 'byor sgom pa'i bar chad can/ /phyi rol bzlas pa spang bar bya/ /sngags don bcom ldan rdo rje can/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid ci ltar bzlas zhes so/ gsungs pa yang/ gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba/ /gsang sngags tshul
90b6(rgyud 'grel): chen bdag nyid can zhes/ /glang chen rnyed nas 'phral du ni/ glang chen rjes ni 'tshol ba ltar/ /rang nyid sngags lus dngos yin na/ /gzhan pa ci zhig tshol bar byed/ /sngags kyi de nyid gsal ba 'di/ /gsung gi rdo rje'i sgrub thabs te/ /ye
90b7(rgyud 'grel): shes gsum gyi dbye ba yis/ /sems tsam la ni nges par sbyor zhes so/ /dpal dgongs pa lung ston pa'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa/ /yi ge gang rnams sngar bshad dang/ /gang yang mngon du phyogs de rnams /bud med skyes pa ma ning ste/ /
91a1(rgyud 'grel): byings la sogs par yongs brtogs shing/ /'og dang steng du yang dag sbyar/ /shes shing rtags na des sbyar ba'o/ /den gyi rjes 'gro'i bzlas pa ni/ /rang bzhin med pa mdzes pa yis/ /ma ning go 'phang la gnas pas/ /
91a2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi yan lag dbyer med gnas/ /dpal lang kar gshegs par gsungs pa yang/ /blo gros chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos don la rtog par bya'i tshig 'bru la rton pa ma yin no/ /blo gros chen po rigs kyi bu 'am
91a3(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi bu mo tshig 'bru'i rjes su 'brang ba ni bdag nyid nyams par byed cing don dam pa'i mdza' yang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/ /blo gros chen po 'di lta ste/ la la zhig 'ga' zhig la sor mo'i rtse mos cung zad gcig ston par byed cing de
91a4(rgyud 'grel): sor mo'i rtse mo nyid la lta ba'i phyed du ston par byed do/ /blo gros chen po de bzhin du byis pa'i rigs can byis pa so so'i skye bo shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyi tshogs rnams/ sgra ji bzhin pa'i sor mo'i rtse la mngon
91a5(rgyud 'grel): par zhen cing mngon par zhen pa de bzhin kho na dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /sgra ji bzhin pa'i sor mo'i rtse mo spangs nas don dam pa tshol bar mi byed do ces so/ /dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa'i le'ur yang gsungs pa/ /rab 'byor
91a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po 'gags na dbang po rnams thams cad 'gags par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa slob bzhin pa'i mi shes pa 'gags na/ mi
91a7(rgyud 'grel): dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad 'gags par 'gyur ro/ /de las gzhan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams tham cad kyang nang du 'dus shing yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro zhes so/ /de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i don 'dod pas
91b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung bar bya zhing de'i phyir phyin ci log pa sgra ji bzhin par don la mngon par zhen pa spang bar bya'o zhes pa'i don to/ /gsungs pa yang/ sngags pas de ltar shes nas ni/ /'gro ni byis pa bzhin du spyad/ /de ltar sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnam par mi rtog
91b2(rgyud 'grel): chos las so zhes so/ /dpal dri ma dang bral ba'i 'od du yang gsungs pa/ 'dir sngags kyi tshul la srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab gsungs gang/ /de rnams thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa
91b3(rgyud 'grel): skyed byed srog chags rnams la nam yang min/ /'dir bdud rnams kyi ni gang zhig dran pa rnams kyi byad po yul gyi yul dga' gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa zhes so/ /dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas su yang gsungs pa/ gang la rigs ni tshad mar gyur pa de la
